reviews.review:
For the first time ever,  I decided to try half life 2. 
heres the positives
>extremely cheap
>runs on 512mb mobo graphics
>pretty fun
>making progress, even though i have no idea what i am doing
heres the negative
>i am only an hour into the game, but no much dialogue

for less than £1, its worth a purchase
Неплохо,мне понравилось конечно я движок Source не очень уважаю))Ну так если делать нечего то можно поиграть))

To any one who heard allot about this game i suggest toning down your expectations because as with everything that is loved
you will be disappointed thinking it's the ultimate game it's not what it is 
is a fun game with little puzzles lots of shooting and compelling mechanic's
ne denilebilir ki... Klasiklerden bir oyun zaten, oynamayıp ta oyuncuyum diyene suikast düzenlenen bir oyunudur. Oynamadıysanız ilk oyunuyla beraber kesinlikle oynamanızı öneririm
10/10 for Morgan Freeman as a man welding a crowbar for no reason.
I enjoyed playing this alot. One of the best games out there.

Even fifteen years later, this game holds up fairly well to most triple a titles. In all fairness the graphics aren't great, but certainly aren't horrible. Great storytelling, good gameplay, an absolute classic.
Dünya'nın en iyi oyunlarından biri olabilir. Tam bir klasik, hazır indirimdeyken Complete Pack ile almanızı öneririm.
How can I don't like that?
The best game i've ever played. Oldschool graphics and amazing gameplay! I recommend this game #GordonCrew #HL3
После Half-Life 3 эта часть выглядит хуже
Love so much but where is Half life 2 ep 3 ?????
игра ахуенная но есть 1- нет продолжения
второй хкалфлайф конечно хорошо но 3 лучше

Juegaso, a pesar de los años desde los que salio, este sigue siendo uno de mis juegos favoritos.
Recomendadisimo, lo unico que te deja mal es lo que todo el mundo sabe... que no haya una continuacion.

Still a fantastic game...
some of the best history elements in video game history (shame there will never be a HL3)
some of the controls a bit outdated, but not to bad
Игра крутая только мы все ждем Half-Life 3

Half - Life 2 
Является старой игрой.В которую невозможно наиграться.Ты играешь в нее часами,днями,и даже годами.И с каждым годом она не стареет.
Игра привлекает очень интересным сюжетом и геймплеем.Яркие сражения,логические загадки,и хороший звук.
Поиграв в эту игру я могу с уверенностью сказать что она понравиться вам,и точно завлечет вас на несколько часов.
Years after its release, it still remains the best representative of game design for an FPS in history.
Могу пройти на ноуклипе, мне поебать. Но я не буду)
Great game, great story. buy this.
Otimo jogo, um dos melhores que ja joguei até hoje
This Game is good i loved
A solid FPS. It has the story of Bubsy 3D with the game play of Slime Rancher and the Controls of Sonic Mania. One of the best FPS games of 2019.
bkz.dünyanın en iyi oyunun devam oyununun da şaheser olma durumu
Legend of the game.Dont have to say anything else.
its a classic, idk what else to say
One of the best games ever!!!
Халф лайф одна из культовых игры. Это почти как классика. Реккомендую всем
valve kryto valve klas kto ne vidit tamy v glas

Community: Holesome ❎| Nice ❎| Funny ❎| Salty ❎| Toxic ❎| Rust ❎
Game play: Half-life 3 ✅| Hella nice❎| Enjoyable ❎| Fun ❎|Has it’s moments ❎| Roblox ❎| mentally degrading/Pubg❎
Bugs: None❎| Like 3✅| Needs a polish❎| Demo❎| Skyrim❎| You to move house right now.
Story: None❎| it really makes you feel like batman✅| The standard❎| Hunt down the refund❎
Graphics: Literally real life❎| Red dead redemption 2❎| The standard✅| Roblox❎| Pubg❎
(Special) Level design: Fucking amazing✅

Overall score 9/10 Got lost a teeny bit but amazing story Level design game play over all worth the money you should get it while it's on sale

Half Life 2 est un très bon jeu ayant des graphisme très correct l'histoire est prenante et très complète on incarne Gordon Freeman (Comme dans Half Life) qui vient d'arriver a city 17 et qui se met a rejoindre les rebelle et rencontre Alyx Vance leurs but battre le cartel.
Ce jeu est très agréable a jouer et même génial en co-op car oui on peux jouer en co-op grace a synergie qui est disponible sur steam et je vous conseille vraiment de tester avec un amis.
ce jeu je ne peux que vous le conseiller tout comme half life premier du nom l'histoire est vraiment bien foutu.

Do i need to say anything? 

It is THE best game on PC that still holds up to this day.
одна из моих любимых игр. Я считаю что каждый хоть раз должен в неё поиграть.
Лучшие переговоры по рации, которые я слышал
настольгия,с начала купил гарис мод потом купил халву почти прошел ,советую сделать так,с начала пройдите халву а потом играйте в гарис мод
Truly Great Game. The voice acting, the game play, everything is great about this game.From the combat to The AI. 10/10
great game but Im still waiting for HL3
The Half-life series is one of the best. I you have the money you should buy this amazing game!
Good, buy, very nice, half life 3, confirm
